name: Blind End Dance Hall
description:
Blind Accessible Rhythm Game. Time to dance like a beast!

A simple and fun Call-and-Response game!!

Listen to the music cues, then follow the rhythm and repeat the pattern by pressing the corresponding arrow keys

  • Up Arrow Key for Snare Drum
  • Left Arrow Key for Tom Drum Panned Left
  • Right Arrow Key for Tom Drum Panned Right
  • Down Arrow Key for Kick drum 

3  Difficulties to choose from
